channel.title: [PI] thieving three objects from the one stall
channel.description:
hey guys, i added a thieiving stall and 3 items to thieve from it in action handler, currently it only lets me thieve one. right now it thieves manta rays, the middle code.
[code] case 4876: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(391, 5000, 1);//Sea Turtles c.getThieving().stealFromStall(389, 7000, 20);//manta rays c.getThieving().stealFromStall(385, 10000, 100);//sharks break; [/code]
please help, if you are unclear it only lets me thieve one item where's i think it should let me thieve 3.

item.title: [PI] thieving three objects from the one stall
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

hmm try to make two of them be like getItems(0additems or however it went. In theory by having all three of those you are telling it to thieve three times.

Read full topic
